body_html: Use Tensorflow on virtualized environments as Docker/VirtualBox is a very bad solution. Tensorflow should run on Windows natively. (And since the most is coded in Python should not be a problem create a distribution for Windows.)
body_text: Use Tensorflow on virtualized environments  as Docker/VirtualBox is a very bad solution. Tensorflow should run on Windows natively. (And since the most is coded in Python should not be a problem create a distribution for Windows.)
body: Use Tensorflow on virtualized environments  as Docker/VirtualBox is a very bad solution. Tensorflow should run on Windows natively. (And since the most is coded in Python should not be a problem create a distribution for Windows.)
